meanings.definition: A gathering or meeting held before a larger event or meeting.
meanings.sent1: The preunions for the school dance were full of excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent2: We always have preunions to discuss the agenda before the big conference.
meanings.sent3: The preunions turned into a mini-party with snacks and music.
meanings.sent4: The preunions acted as a bridge between different departments within the company.
meanings.sent5: Attending the preunions helped everyone feel more prepared for the main event.

meanings.definition: The act of uniting or joining together in advance.
meanings.sent1: The preunions of the puzzle pieces made it easier to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: Their preunions before the project ensured smooth collaboration among team members.
meanings.sent3: The preunions of flavors in the recipe created a unique taste sensation.
meanings.sent4: The preunions of ideas led to a breakthrough in scientific research.
meanings.sent5: The preunions of forces resulted in a stronger, more cohesive team.
